items.desc: the YK Printed Boy's Round Neck Dark Blue T-Shirt fit real well at first, I suppose. However after a few hours into the night               I started to wish I had gone up a size or two. Every couple minutes I had to               re-adjust. It wasn't a cute look on the dance floor haha. Wish I had               size up, otherwise I've no other regrets.
items.title: YK Printed Boy's Round Neck Dark Blue T-Shirt

items.desc: As a first-time buyer, I must say, I am head over heels in love with my               purchase! The moment I delicately wear the YK Printed Boy's Round Neck Dark Blue T-Shirt, I felt an instant               connection, as if it was meant to be.               What impressed me the most was the comfort it provded throughout the day.
items.title: YK Printed Boy's Round Neck Dark Blue T-Shirt

items.desc: I recently had the pleasure of wearing the most enchanting KRAZY KATZ Solid Men's Round Neck T-Shirt               for a special occasion, and let me tell you, heads turned and compliments poured               in all night long!               The fit was mostly great.
items.title: KRAZY KATZ Solid Men's Round Neck T-Shirt

items.desc: I recently purchased the KRAZY KATZ Solid Men's Round Neck T-Shirt from this store, and I must say, it's               absolutely stunning! The quality is premium, and the work is a testament to the remarkable craftsmanship.               The product is beautiful, and the rich color hasn't faded a bit even after a few wears.
items.title: KRAZY KATZ Solid Men's Round Neck T-Shirt
